name: Spotify (Apple Watch Version) [Redesign]
description:
-READ DESCRIPTION FIRST-

This is the first Concept that I´ll be posting online! I really didn´t do much because its 1:30 a.m (CEST) and I need sleep✨ anyways, hope y´all like it!

Feel free to use this Concept but don´t forget the credits please!


C R E D I T S

Icons by @annan

Album by Billie Eilish. Available everywhere.


I N F O S

Fonts:

  • SF Pro Text (Regular)
  • SF Pro Text (Bold)

Device that the Design is based on:

  • Apple Watch Series (?) 44mm

Things you can do in the Prototype:

  • Open the Album "Happier Than Ever" and see the first two Songs (Press on the Cover on the first Screen and to close the Album press the X on the corner)
  • Swipe up from the bottom to open the Player (Swipe down to close the Player again)
  • See a self-made Share-Sheet (Press the Share Icon in the Player and Swipe down to close the Share-Sheet again)
